anl.verdi.plot.types

Interface TimeAnimatablePlot

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Plot
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTilePlot, Contour3D, FastAreaTilePlot, FastTilePlot, TilePlot, VerticalCrossSectionPlot

    public interface TimeAnimatablePlot
extends Plot
    Interface for plots that can have their timestep updated and be animated.
    Version:
    $Revision$ $Date$
    Author:
    Nick Collier
